channel.title: Alternative client and recoloring
channel.description:
i have a server i have put on rs-ps.org but i am fed up with them turning off their client loaders so all you see is a client loading for about... ever... anyways i need a alternative client to HybridPvp V3 if someone can tell me what i should use that would be awesome client needs like torva update items and curses interface all need to corrispond to hybrid pvp because i dont want to change all of that lol it would take months and plus i could no longer use my rs-ps's client or rspscoding's clients
recoloring: i always was kinda currious about this and no one has answered it yet so... how can you find the color ids exactly not memory and not using color ids from other ints somthing like a color picker? and could you point me to the site its on or the download is on? i will probly find use for it later

item.title: Alternative client and recoloring
item.dc:creator: @Roar337 Roar337
item.description:
@Roar337 wrote:

still wondering bout coloring

Read full topic

item.title: Alternative client and recoloring
item.dc:creator: @A_New_LIght A New LIght
item.description:
@A_New_LIght wrote:

zeposity uses a different client than hybrid look at that. You could also look at a nickname client.

Read full topic

i have a server i have put on rs-ps.org but i am fed up with them turning off their client loaders so all you see is a client loading for about… ever… anyways i need a alternative client to HybridPvp V3 if someone can tell me what i should use that would be awesome client needs like torva update items and curses interface all need to corrispond to hybrid pvp because i dont want to change all of that lol it would take months and plus i could no longer use my rs-ps’s client or rspscoding’s clients
